thread.title: Yankees' Alex Rodriguez: Mets can win '3 or 4' World Series in next 5 years
thread.title_full: Yankees' Alex Rodriguez: Mets can win '3 or 4' World Series in next 5 years

author: Ryan Hatch | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: Yankees' Alex Rodriguez: Mets can win '3 or 4' World Series in next 5 years
text:
Comments 
Given their talent, Yankees ' slugger-turned-television star Alex Rodriguez said Monday that the Mets can win "three or four" World Series titles in the next five years. (The quest for their first since 1986 begins Tuesday against the Kansas City Royals.) 
A-Rod, newly-minted FOX analyst for the remainder of the 2015 Major League Baseball postseason, said on a conference call reported by the New York Post Monday that like the Mets team from mid-80s—one he adored—is stocked with "once-in-a-century" pitching staff. 
But, he said, the Mets are going to have their work cut out for them. 
"The Mets are gonna be pushed and challenged in a way they haven't been before," A-Rod said . "When you have a team as aggressive as [the Royals] are, it's usually an undisciplined team, but Kansas City's not that way." 
K.C. holds home field advantage in the Series, while Games 3, 4, and a possible 5th will be at Citi Field in New York. A-Rod wouldn't say who he thought was going to win the series. Inside the Mets champagne clubhouse celebration The New York Mets celebrate their NLCS sweep of the Chicago Cubs with champagne. (Video by John Munson | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com) 
Here are the World Series pitching match-ups for the first four contests: 
GAME 1 
Royals : RHP Edinson Volquez (13-9, 3.55) 
GAME 2 
Mets: RHP Jacob deGrom (14-8, 2.54) 
Royals: RHP Johnny Cueto (4-7, 4.76) 
GAME 3 
Mets: RHP Noah Sydergaard (9-7, 3.24) 
Royals: RHP Yordano Ventura (13-8, 4.08) 
GAME 4 
Mets: LHP Steven Matz (4-0, 2.77) 
Royals: RHP Chris Young (11-6, 3.06)
